REAL MODERN CONCRETE SEAMLESS PLANTER – This modern contemporary seamless planter with an authentic Charcoal concrete finish with visible pores will add an elegant touch to your décor and will turn it into an eye-catching atmosphere
SMOOTH ROUND DESIGN – The smooth lines and round shape of these planters will help you maintain a sleek look throughout your space, while holding a good amount of plants without looking crowded
HANDMADE CONCRETE PLANTER POTS – Made of concrete and weather-resistant fiberglass that have all the advantages of these materials, such as strength, durability, weather and damage resistance, and long-lasting color, has a drainage hole and a strong UV resistant ability that stays well in wind, rain, hot and cold season
LARGE & VERSATILE – Large tall planter (Size:18-in W x 18-in L x 17-in H) with a unique design that will match any home décor for outdoor and indoor, perfect for the living room, bedroom, office or any lonely corner in need of love. Or use it outside on your deck, patio or in the garden
100% SATISFACTION – We are committed to providing the best customer service so if unsatisfied, let us know and we’ll provide return full refund or a replacement

PUMA: construido para una actividad de apoyo suave/impacto medio para que puedas mantener un movimiento constante. Estilo clásico con un ajuste moderno y cómodo.

PUMA – Entwickelt für weiche Unterstützung / Mid-Impact-Aktivität, damit Sie konsistente Bewegungen beibehalten können. Klassischer Überziehstil mit moderner, bequemer Passform.

بوما – مصممة لدعم ناعم/ نشاط متوسط التأثير حتى تتمكن من الحفاظ على حركة ثابتة. تصميم كلاسيكي سهل الارتداء مع ملاءمة عصرية ومريحة.

PUMA – construído para suporte suave/atividade de médio impacto para que você possa manter o movimento consistente. Estilo clássico de vestir com um ajuste moderno e confortável.

PUMA – 專為軟支撐/中衝擊活動而設計,可保持一致的運動。 經典套頭式設計,現代舒適貼合。

About Us

Sport has the power to transform and empower us. To achieve that, the PUMA brand is based on the very values that make an excellent athlete.

Be Brave

We’re never afraid to take risks. We trust our instincts to make unexpected choices that push sport forward.

Be Confident

Whatever we do, we do with conviction. We make strong statements, we are bold and we believe in ourselves.

Be Determined

Nothing comes between us and realizing our dreams. We believe success is an endless pursuit to improve ourselves and how we play.

Environmental Protection: Our sports bras for women are made from more than 50% recycled materials which is soft and comfortable to wear. We also use high quality packaging bag that can be re-used.
Fabric: The padded sports bra use seamless fabric which has 4-way stretch provide you with maximum flexibility, easy to put on and take off, Moisture-wicking and contract freely during exercise without being tight.
Style: V-neck sports bra can better highlight the body curve. Pullover style and wide shoulders strap provides medium support, the workout bra with racerback design keeps you cool all the day.
Feature: Built-in removable mesh pads completely wraps the chest, breathable and not stuffy during exercise. Elastic band at the bottom of seamless sports bra can hold the chest tightly, and you will not feel shaking when exercising.
Occasion: Celer racerback sports bra is suitable for running, gym, yoga, exercise, and daily wear. Tips: The bright colors may see the pads. We advise you choose darker colors or just remove the pads if you mind this problem.
